result.arabic_text: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ أَمۡرُنَا جَعَلۡنَا عَٰلِيَهَا سَافِلَهَا وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهَا حِجَارَةٗ مِّن سِجِّيلٖ مَّنضُودٖ
result.translation: Yeroo ajajni keenya dhufu, gubbaa ishee (magaalattii) jala ishee taasifnee, Ishee irratti dhagaa dhoqqee gubamaa irraa tahe wal hordofaa roobsifne.
